content: just a little more complex than the basic stockinette sock cranberry biscotti alternates three colours in a woven stripe slip-stitch pattern also included is a delicious recipe for cranberry chocolate biscotti >***have you cast on this pattern *** we love to see your projects tag your photos on instagram with **#mysweetpaprikaproject** to enter our monthly giveaway for a chance to win a **$25 gift card** for www sweetpaprikadesigns com 1 see details here 2 **size** women s medium **finished measurements** circumference 7 foot length 9 **yarn** fingering weight 230 yds colour a 115 yds each in colours b and c shown in sweet paprika messa di voce 3 1 skein each in canneberge a café au lait b and hot cocoa c **needles** size 1 2 25mm set of double-pointed needles **notions** yarn needle **gauge** 20 sts and 32 rnds = 2 5cm in slip-stitch pattern worked in the round 1 https //www sweetpaprikadesigns com utm_source=ravelry&utm_medium=pattern&utm_campaign=monthly_giveaway 2 https //bit ly/space-iggivaway 3 https //www sweetpaprikadesigns com/collections/hand-dyed-yarn/products/messa-di-voce utm_source=ravelry&utm_medium=pattern&utm_campaign=rav
